text: Sundown is the second and final album by the British pop group S Club 8. It was released in 2003 and went to number 13 on the UK Albums Chart. The track "One Thing I Know" was co-written by the former Spice Girl Emma Bunton, who also provided backing vocals. The title track was also released by another 19 Management act, American Juniors. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2003) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2003 albums Category:S Club 8 albums Category:Polydor Records albums
title: Sundown (S Club 8 album)
